lines.text: There's got to be a way to get their attention, a way they can't ignore us.
We could always not take any baths.
Oh yeah my dad would go for that, sure.
Wait a minute. That's actually not a bad idea. It hurts no one, but it would most certainly make people take notice.
You mean it would make people hold their noses!
So this is what it's all come down to. A bunch of elementary school kids are telling the parents what to do!
We're not gonna take anymore baths until we get our way, WAAAAAAHHHHH! But I say, let's look at whose fault this *really* is.

[rallying]
Save Jake's lot! We have rights too! We have solutions! Hear us now or smell us later!
Are we willing to stand up for what we believe in?
No more baths! No more baths! No more baths!
